Header: 71,000 police personnel for presidential election duties.
Content: A media briefing on deploying police personnel at the upcoming presidential election was held at the Colombo police headquarters yesterday. Participating in the media briefing police media spokesman SSP Ajith Rohana said that steps had been taken to strengthen security at the presidential election this time. Participating in the media briefing police media spokesman SSP Ajith Rohana said that the highest number of police personnel in the history of Sri Lankan elections were scheduled to be deployed at the upcoming presidential election.
